summary: Welcome if you want to stay at a cozy flat with local experience.:) It is in the center of Istanbul.The neighborhood is safe and close to attractions.Transportation is easy. I will help you always.
interaction: After the booking you can reach me from (Hidden by Airbnb) or whatsaap

host.about:
I live alone in Taksim area and i work at bar.
I like meet new friends from all of the world.
I like to Travel a lot ofcourse if i have free time :) East Asia , Sun , Sea , Sand , Movie  :)

reviews.txt:
I greatly appreciated both the location of the place (very central) and the appartment per se (clean and comfortable, with a very cosy room and with Wi-Fi). 

Nihat was perfect host, quite welcoming and helpful about places to go (or avoid) and things to do in town. 

Hosça kal!
Nice room in a flat well located. Nihat is very nce and helpful. Good experience.

We had a fantastic stay in this charming apartment. The location was perfect and Nihat welcomed us even when we made a late reservation and arrived early. He works at a bar no far from there- a great place to have a drink after seeing the sites! I highly recommend this place!

The flat is clean and and very good located, 3 minutes walk to Taksim Square. The bedroom is quiet at night, even though there is a crowded area next to the flat. Nihat was always extremely quick in answering our emails and let us feel comfortable. He is really kind and discrete, we met him few times cause he works in the evening.
Nihat went out of his way to accommodate our very early arrival and some unforeseeable challenges.  A great host!
Nice place and host, very good location :)
Everything was great about the room and the location.

The stay at Nihat's place was really pleasant. The apartment is very clean and confortable, and located in a very vibrant and animated neighborhood with many restaurants, cafes, bars, shops just nearby. Just a 5 min walk to the Taksim Metro station makes it easy to access any other parts of the city pretty quickly. Nihat was also a great and welcoming host. We totally recommend this place for your stay in Istanbul, especially if you want to experience the local life to the fullest !
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I stayed at Nihat's for a week. It was exactly as the pics, very nice room. A little bit cold but he offers heating and AC. The apt is cozy and central, close to nice restaurants and bars. Have in mind is on the 4th fl no elevator. Nihat is a very easygoing guy who's open to help with any question or tip about the city. Totally recommend! thanks Nihat!
Nihat is a very nice host, he is very helpful and creates an agreeable atmosphere inside the flat. Thank you :)
Nice cozy place very close to Taksim Square. Nihat is helpful and informative.
nice apartment with good location. the room was clean and neat. Nihat was helpful and supportive. totally recommend his accommodation

Nihat is a very friendly host and makes you really feel comfortable. I have had a great stay and recommend it to anyone who wants to stay very central (Cihangir), the hip and modern part of the city with cozy venues and great cafes just a 3min walk. The place is very close to Taksim Square, etc...everything as described in the prior conments. I will definitely come again! Cheers vural

I totally recommend this place. Great experience staying at Nihat’s apartment. To start with, Nihat is a wonderful friendly person who I was happy to meet. He was very friendly at house, and we had the chance to spend time together outside. Staying with him reflects the true meaning of this website, which is living as a local with a local person. Thank you Nihat. 
Regarding the apartment, it is exactly as described. The room is nice and bed is comfortable. It was clean and well prepared for us. 
Regarding the neighborhood, it is very close to Taksim square and Istiklal Street with few minutes walk. As normal as it is in Istanbul, there is a short hill you need to walk to get to the square, which was totally fine with us. 

In general, next time I visit Istanbul I would first check the availability with Nihat before searching others.

Nihat was an amazing host. He picked me up from the bus stop, gave me some great tips on what to do in Istanbul and just an all round great guy. If you're looking for somewhere close to Taksim then Nihat's place is great. Highly recommend him! Thanks Nihat.

Nihat is so hospitable person. Me and My boyfriend stayed 6 days in Nihat's place and everything was perfect. Nihat is so tactful person despite he was working so hard, he all the time asked us 'do we need anything?' he was so clean and his house is exactly same with the pictures.
I'm highly recommend his place! 
thank you Nihat!
Very helping and welcoming host. Perfect location for a few days in Istanbul.

Nihat was very nice, polite and very helpful to us. He let us drop our baggages off in the morning and left them for a little longer when we checked out. The location is great as it is near Taksim Square. There are local grocery shops nearby if you want to buy some food or snacks.

Nihat is very nice host, and came to wait for me in the shuttle bus station near Taksim squre, His house is very convenient for travel. He is very experirenced and warm host, the room super clean and warm, and house has everything, next time i will choose his house again in istanbul. miss you nihat. see you next time.

name: Penthouse Sands of Kahana Sandy Swimmable Beach
summary: Price includes nightly rate & 14.42% tax.  Our fully remodeled 9th floor Penthouse unit offers the most amazing views.  The entire front of the condo is windows offering you a fantastic view of beautiful Pacific Ocean, Molokai & Lana'i.  Perfect location for watching beautiful sunsets, see our resident sea turtles & an excellent place for spotting whales during the whale migration season. This spacious two level 3 bedroom and 3 full bath Penthouse unit has over 2,050 sq ft of living space w/ AC.
interaction: As your host I will be available via phone for any questions or concerns.  I am always happy to answer any questions or give assistance prior to your arrival.
houseRules: Resort fee of $75 collected by front desk at time of check in.  One time fee. - Rates are for 6 guests.  An additional $25 per night per person for up to 2 more guests. - Resort Quiet Hours 10:00 p.m. - 8:00 a.m. - No smoking on the lanai or in unit per Hawaii state law

host.about: My husband and I are Real Estate Investors.  We enjoy traveling and no matter where we go, we always find ourselves looking at properties.  Since we still have school age children I have found that a beach vacation is usually the most enjoyable for everyone.  Living on the West Coast, Hawaii continued to be a place that we would return to time and time again.

reviews.txt:
We have just returned from a fabulous holiday at Cynthia's condo on Maui. Everything was fantastic. From the moment we booked Cynthia could not have been more helpful with everything and was always ready and willing to answer all of our queries. Cynthia provided us with an extensive list of recommendations for our stay on Maui and we were not disappointed. The condo is located in a quiet but convenient neighbourhood and close to many amenities. We found the condo extremely spacious and it accommodated our party of 3 adults and two teenaged children with no problem at all. Cynthia's condo is the penthouse and is set right on the beach so we were treated to gorgeous Hawaiian sunsets every night, as well as being able to see turtles and whales from our balcony. The condo is beautifully presented and very well equipped - we could not have asked for anything more for our nine day stay. 
Mahalo Cynthia
The location was great and the view was incredible! You are right on the beach and it is a great place for families with kids. Highly recommend staying here!

This place was beyond my expectations. There were no hidden surprises. Knew exactly what to expect, and Cynthia was always there to answer any quesions. The view is spectacular. Beautiful location. I highly recommend this place.
Very nice location with good beach. Penthouse is nice sized and comfortable. Amenities are good. Location is very good with close proximity to Lahaina and Kapalua.

If you want a one-stop, stress-free vacation, in a beautiful location with all the amenities you need....this is it!  We lucked out with perfect weather too.  Cynthia provides basic amenities, pool towels, bookie boards, snorkeling gear, and the comfort of being in a cozy home.  It was really easy to run up to the Condo for my 9-month old nap times or a quick snack, without being too separated from the family.  The onsite pools, restaurant and of course restaurant/bar became our home bases for the week.  Miso Phat Sushi (across the street) and Maui Brewing were awesome near-by/within walking distance restaurants.  My family and I can't stop bragging about our trip and what a wonderful family/group set-up this Condo is!  We recommend renting a car due to the distance from the airport, but the Condo/Resort has onsite parking.

Such a beautiful location in Paradise! The amazing balconies provided us with gathering spots for our morning coffee to watch the whales and gorgeous sunsets each evening. During our week long stay, we decided to visit Costco, the local fish market and the farmers market and ate 4 dinners in the condo.  The kitchen has everything you need, and the barbques downstairs were perfect for grilling.  Cynthia left us plenty of information for dining in the vicinity, so we had 3 nice dinners out. The guide she sent us before our visit was very informative and helped us to plan our outings while in Maui. Cynthia also checked in with us during our visit, making sure we had everything we needed. We are already planning a return visit to #391 at the Sands of Kahana in the near future!

We had such a great time at Cynthia's condo.  Everything was sparkling clean. The check in and check out were seamless.  We loved that the condo came with some beach gear for our use (snorkels, boogie boards, water shoes...).  The views from the balconies are outstanding.  There is a nice and swimmable beach right downstairs, as well as a volleyball court and a casual restaurant. Great location with easy access to beach rentals, groceries, and anything else you might need during your stay.  Cynthia was very quick to respond to any questions we had. Loved the place! Would definitely stay again.

This place was incredible. From the views to the thoughtfulness in everything in the condo. While climbing nine flights of stairs during an unexpected elevator renovation (that ends in May!) does not sound fun, it was actually not bad at all for the adults in our party, as well as the 3 sub-8 year old children, and allowed us to think we were earning all the delicious calories we ate and drank.

I cannot rave enough about the amenities that are incredibly family friendly, including a full sized high chair, travel crib, toddler (and big kid) friendly toys for both indoors and at the beach. Cynthia is very quick to respond to communication and is clear as to what she can provide as a host, as well as her expectation of guests. She was as incredible as her Kahana home was and we'd highly recommend this place for anyone, including those with small children.
This place is amazing. We will be back!

What an amazing place to stay with a spectacular view!! The beach out front is awesome and we saw turtles daily! Cynthia was great with communication and making our stay feel just like home. Hope to stay here again!!
Fantastic unit. Amazing sunsets.

Enjoyed our stay very much! The condo was clean, spacious and with all the amenities of a home away from home. Cynthia was very responsive, even checking up on us when the tropical storm warnings went out. Thankfully, the storm didn’t dampen our stay. Enjoyed many beautiful Maui sunsets from the home!

The place has amazing ocean views!!! Cynthia provided beach chairs, gears, and toys for the kids. The entire condo is well organized and our family had such a great time. Appreciate all the little touches you provided for your guests. Will definitely stay there again when we return on Maui! :)

This condo was very spacious.  We had eight people (ages 5-85) and there was plenty of space for everyone.  Cynthia was readily accessible if we needed anything.  The view from the lanai was breathtaking and we watched whales every morning.  The condo was stocked with plenty of snorkel gear, boogie boards, beach chairs, sand toys for the kids, board games, puzzles, etc.  The kitchen had plenty of pots, pans, dishes, utensils, etc.  Thanks for the great stay!
Very clean. Cleanest Airbnb we have stayed at. Beautiful home and beautiful view of the sunset from the apartment. Loved that they had binoculars to see the whales jumping out in the distance.

If you are wanting a beautiful place right on the beach when you visit Kaanapali with your family , then this is the place for you ! Gorgeous full ocean view from the large deck ,large spacious rooms, super clean, lots of extras and great communication with Cynthia! We came here with our 3 adult kids and their spouses and loved everything about this place .. well stocked kitchen , lots of towels, beach toys (boogie boards were a hit ) comfortable beds ..and then there is outside !  Beautiful clean beach right outfront, nice pool and grounds , very helpful staff and amenities close by ... we watched whales and turtles right from our beach and deck, amazing !! This condo made our trip to Maui a real treat ..chose Cynthia's condo , you will not be disappointed !!

I cannot say enough good things about this condo. There was more than enough space for my friends and I to spread out. Each room was beautifully decorated. the bathrooms we're impeccably remodeled, I even took inspiration pictures! Cynthia thought of everything to make this a home away from home. AC was in every room, but with the trade winds, we never needed it. Don't hesitate, book this place now!!!

name: Habitación indiv con cama extra
summary: Acogedora habitacion doble con posibilidad de una cama extra en el barrio de gracia en un tipico piso modernista. Situado en pleno centro geografico de Barcelona y todos sus distritos. zona tranquila y bien comunicada por metro y bus.
interaction: I live here, i am happy to help and point you in the right direction. I  can recommend lots of good places to eat and drink.
houseRules: This is a quite neighbourhood and building, people is really respectfull, just collaborate to maintain it and not to create noisy or disrespectful situations.  The apartment is clean and tidy. Feel free to use the space to stay comfortable but leave the things as you found them taking care of them and cleaning all you use.

host.about: Hola me llamo txus trabajo en el mundo de las terapias como osteopata y llevo 12 años viviendo en barcelona , me encanta esta ciudad y en especial el barrio de gracia , tranquilo y animado al mismo tiempo . Como viajero me gusta conocer gente de culturas diferentes y si lo necesitan ayudar a conocer esta maravillosa ciudad

reviews.txt: Ottima persona , sempre disponibile per qualsiasi cosa! La casa è stata accogliente e situata in una buona posizione per spostarsi in metro, ben collegata e vicino alla Sagrada Familia! Consigliata !

Nous avons été très bien reçus par Txus. Il vit dans un appartement qui est typiquement espagnol et c'est vraiment plaisant pour nous qui sommes touristes de voir ce type de logement. Il était très gentil et nous étions bien dans la chambre. Merci Txus!!
The apartment of Txus is perfect, we loved to stay here. I think the next time I'll go to Barcelona, I'll go there again if the apartment is free.

The apartment was better then expected! It is really cute and I love the tiled floor.
It was easy to find and a walk from town. Everyone was really friendly in the house and the kitchen had everything we needed :)
Relatively straightforward to get to from the airport, although luggage in the underground is a nightmare as there are often no escalators!
Would highly recommend this place!
Very nice and helpful. He waited for us until 2am, because we our airplane had a delayed. In the morning he cooked coffee and gave us all the neccesary information that we asked. Really nice staying.
Bien, amable y correcto
Txus was very friendly and accommodating. His place was walkable to attractions and comfortable. Would certainly recommend.

It was great! Txus's apartment is located in a quiet area that is close to some of the major tourist attractions (15min walk to Sagrada Familia, 15 min to Casa Milà, 20min to Park Güell) and has several metro stations nearby if one is feeling lazy. It is basically a shared flat where you can use the room appointed, living room (with a balcony), kitchen and bathroom. Everything was very clean and nice (way better that in the pictures). The room we stayed in was not very big, but it had everything we needed. Txus is very nice and helpful and made us feel really welcomed. Would totally recommend!

Txus is a very nice guy, hè was very welkomming, even though hè had been waiting for us for more than a hour.
Nice clean room, comfortable bed. Clean shared bathroom, good shower.
Nearby metrostation, safe area. Would reccomend!

Top! Txus is very kind and helpful. He's a lovely and careful person. The house is very clean, the room is minimal but comfortable, i liked it. Close to the house there r bus stations and metro stations.

Very good stay by Txus who is a very nice thoughtful guy, ans very helpful and welcoming. His shared appartement is relaxing, each person is respectful. The area ist very calm, I loved this quarter. I recommand his place.
Txus is very kind, helpful and welcoming host! The beds were comfy and the bathroom was nice and clean. All you really need!

Txus is very kind and gentle. We arrived at 1:00Am and he is patient to wait us. and everyday and night he would chat with us. Haha. And my friend says he is sooooo handsome hahaha.The house is in the center of Barcelona. It's convenient to go Park Guell and beach also. We enjoyed live in Txus ' place.
We spent to months in the apartment. Everything was good and clean. Txus was very kind. Very good stay!

Txus was an incredible host. He offered any help we needed, gave us a city map, provided suggestions, and gave us a very clean and welcoming home to stay in. The location was perfect for seeing Gaudi's works and catching the metro to the city center by the beach. We loved it.
Good location, good and flexible host, basic accommodation but good value. Recommended!
Great place, very friendly host who keeps in good contact
Texus est un super hôte très serviable, il prend le temps de vous conseiller sur les lieux à visiter à barcelone. Le séjour c'est très bien passé.

Txus is the perfect host, hospitable and nice. He gave us advice on places to visit and always take a moment to talk with us.
The room is convenient and the flat is in the center of the city, next to the sagrada familia and parc güell, bus and subway station. I recommend this accomodation without hesitation.
Very supportive host. Everything was clear and the place is close to the public transport. We had great time at Txus's place.

name: Allotja't en un elegant i lluminós pis modernista al costat de Passeig de Gràcia
summary: Deixa't seduir per l'encant dels paviments de mosaic i els alts sostres artesonats d'aquest elegant i lluminós apartament modernista  ubicat en un edifici classic rehabilitat i  a tant sols 30 metres del Passeig de Gracia

Do not throw towels, napkins etc ... in the toilet Smoking is NOT allowed in the apartment. Chimenea decorativa, prohibido encender fuego. gracias

host.about: Hi we are Lluis and Lali, we have rehabilitated this luminous apartment at heart of Barcelona. If you come to our city, this is a fantastic option, premium located, to enjoy your stay. See you at BCN :)

reviews.txt:
The appartment is situated near the public transport and the great shopping street "Passeig de Gràcia" with a lot of shops, cafés and restaurants.
 
Due to the central proximity the appartement is perfect for a sightseeing trip in Barcelona (10 min to walk to Plaça Catalunya, 2 min walk to the taxis and the bus stops).
 
The appartment is newly renovated, with modern furniture and a beautiful old tiled floor and stucco work in some of the rooms.
 
The automatic air conditioning for manual temperatur setting is very comfortable.
The conservatory (winter garden) is a additional room with a view in the courtyard (the view is not very spectacular but it is very comfortable there). Since the appartment is in the city center there is no fabulos view from none of the windows - but this does not matter at all.
 
There is also a Nespresso coffee machine in the modern kitchen (bring the capsules by your one or there is a Nespresso shop 100m away).
 
We can fully recomand this special appartment and Lluis as perfect host in this wunderful city.
Muchos gracias Lluis!!
 
Marcella and familiy

 *   * 



Das Appartment ist in unmittelbarer Nähe vom öffentlichen Verkehr und der grossen Einkaufsstrasse "Passeig de Gràcia" mit unzähligen Läden, Cafes und Restaurants.




Ideal für einen Sightseeing-Aufenthalt in Barcelona, da zentral gelegen (ca. 10 min zu Fuss zur Plaça Catalunya, 2 min zum Taxi-Stand und Bus-Haltestellen).


Wir waren zu 5. für drei Tage in Lluis Wohnung und haben uns sofort sehr wohl gefühlt. Lluis war bei der Schlüsselübergabe bereits vor Ort und hat uns gute Tipps für Barcelona gegeben. 



Die Wohnung ist neu renoviert, modern eingerichtet und hat wunderschöne alte Böden und Stuckaturen in manchen Zimmern.

Es hat eine automatische Lüftung: Die Temperatur kann manuell eingestellt werden (sehr angenehm).

Der verglaste Raum („Wintergarten“) ist ein zusätzlicher Raum mit Aussicht auf den Innenhof (die Aussicht ist jetzt nicht wirklich atemberaubend, aber es ist sehr gemütlich). Eine schöne Aussicht gibt es von keinem Fenster aus, da sich die Wohnung Mitten in der Stadt befindet - Stört aber nicht.

Es hat eine Nespresso-Kaffee-Maschine (Kapseln selber mitbringen oder 100m von der Wohnung gibt’s einen Nespresso-Shop).


Wir können die Wohnung und Lluis als Gastgeber nur weiterempfehlen.

Muchos gracias Lluis!!!


Marcella and familiy

Apartment´s location is top, just off Passeig de Gràcia. The apartment has a good & simple restauration preserving the original modernist floors & ceilings yet with modern kitchen and bathrooms.
Lluis was a great helpful host & proved to be very professional. 
Highly recommended.

Lluis is the perfect host, with great communication beforehand and a very warm welcome, he was also really flexible and understanding at check out too.

The apartment is really well located and as shown in the pictures very clean, tidy and stylish.

The apartment has great facilities, the kitchen is fully stocked (not the we needed to use it with so many great restaurants) and the shower was fantastic.

The beds are really comfortable, and the rooms very quiet (if you have the windows closed) and there is air con.

I would definitely book this place again and look forward to returning.
Huge thanks!
Very nice place to live...

The apartment is perfect. Great location, close to the metro station on ‘Passeig de Garcia’. 5-10 min. walking distance to many attractions such as Gaudi’s casa mila, Plaça Catalunya, Rambla st. and more.
The apartment is very big with all the needed facilities. It’s just been renovated and it’s clean and comfortable. 
Lluis was a great host. Help us with all our needs, even with ticket to Barcelona FC game. He was very flexible with our check-in and check-out times, and gave us tip for good restaurants in the area. 
Highly recommended. I’m sure you’ll enjoy its as we did.

Lluis' place was clean, well equipped and perfect for our four day stay in Barcelona.
The location of the apartment is fabulous and dealing with Lluis was seamless.
The photos and descriptions match reality to the T.
Thank you Lluis for having us.

Lluis is great. He was very responsive and accommodating. His apartment is even better than pictured. It is in a lovely area with many good restaurants near by (paco meralgo for example). Morning and evening coffees from his nespresso machine in the gallery were a treat. I would stay there again. Perfect for up to 6 people.

Lluis is a perfect host in every respect.
The apartment is lovely furnished with an eye on detail and good quality. You will find everything you could possibly need in there, starting from equipment (wlan, hairdryer, kitchen equipment etc.) to things like guides and books of Barcelona and Gaudi (in spanish) as well as  brochures on tourist attractions.

Lluis is very attentive and provides you with all kind of information.
Thank you as well for the flexible check-in/out.
The 6 of us were all happy to have chosen this apartment for our weekend-trip.
We can highly recommend it!

Me and my friends had a wonderful time at Lluis' apartment. The place was neat and clean, spacious and comfortable. A nice surprise was that the 'gallery' is really a balcony when you open the outside doors, so you can enjoy the afternoon sun. Lluis is a straightforward and very friendly host. The location is perfect for a weekend trip and I would definitely recommend this apartment to parties of 4-6.

I traveled to Barcelona with 3 other adults and my 2 young girls. The house was fantastic (as was Lluis); I would gladly stay here again. Everything was great, the only thing I would warn you about is the Master Bedroom being loud at night as it faces the main street (noise of cars driving by etc.).

We loved staying at this amazingly located, clean, spacious and hip apartment. We travel often and are very picky so trust this review. They thought of all the details and amenities and the kitchen was very well equipped (they even thought of paper towels, tin foil, plastic wrap) and all appliances were new. The beds were very comfortable and the bathrooms roomy for Europe. Our hosts were friendly and willing to help in any way to make our trip enjoyable. Two of our children got ill and the host even made an appointment for us with their pediatrician and emailed to check up on how the kids were feeling after. Now, that's service! Our only regret was that we didn't stay longer...

We were warmly welcomed by our host on arrival even though it was quite late at night.  The apartment was well set out, clean, tidy and large enough to accommodate 5 adults. Our host emailed us with suggestions for day trips.  The maps provided about local restaurants and nearby supermarkets were appreciated. This apartment is in a great location in Barcelona, although a little noisy some nights. Barcelona is a wonderful city to visit and we can recommend taking the time to venture further out of the city.

Lluis was a great host and very helpful! He met us as soon as we arrived, and showed us around the apartment, which was exactly as seen in the pictures. During our week's stay he e-mailed me info on local restaurants to visit, as well as was responsive to questions I had about the city. We traveled with our 6 month old, and he helped provide us with a crib on request. All in all, a great place to stay with a great host!

Thank you for having us again Lluis.
As on our previous visit, everything ran smoothly and we very much enjoyed your beautiful apartment, hospitality and flexibility with our late departure.
See you in Barcelona sometime soon.

Nous avons très bien été reçu par Lluis, le quartier est vraiment très sympa. L'appartement est vraiment très bien décrit et très agréable.
Lluis est vraiment très disponible et très gentil.
Nous avons passé un très bon moment.

Lluis is very prompt in providing information and responding to questions.  We were not urged or required to check in at any certain time, he is very patient and understandable.  There are more amenities than other places, We really did not expect the nespresso, made us feel very welcome!

La experencia ha sido fantastica, la casa esta muy bien situada, muy limpia y muy bien amueblada, no le falta ni un detalle. Lluis se ha portado muy bien con nosotras, ha sido muy hospitalario y muy atento.

Lluis and his wife are very nice hosts.The apart is stylish and cosy,very clean.Another advantage is perfect location.Just one thing to know it was a bit noisy at night from the street.But it couldn't change our impression from the stay!Next time we will choose the same apart!

Lluis' lejlighed er meget hyggelig og rar at være i. Lejligheden indeholder alt, hvad man har brug for - og lidt til :-) Beskrivelsen af lejligheden stemmer overens med virkeligheden. Lluis tager godt imod sine gæster og sørger for relevant information om lejligheden og omgivelserne.
Vi kan varmt anbefale andre at bo i lejligheden.

We had a wonderful time in this modern and clean apartment which is perfectly centrally located, nice shops in the neighborhood. The beds were very good. We liked the rain shower and the bath. Everything was very good and we would like to come back one time. Lluis is very helpful.

name: sunny 2 bedroom close to Bosphorus
summary: The apartment is located at the very best location in Arnavutköy, not so close to the noise on the seaside but a bit inside. The building has a terrace for many uses.
interaction: We'll be friends, housemates, you're not a customer. It's just that the place has an expense and a value so I should cover it, no?
houseRules: There is a cat in the house. You aren't allowed to hurt it. And also, you need to be careful with the doors&windows, not letting the cat out.

host.about:
Başar Family

Gülder (mother): Owner of ARBA Food. Ltd. Co., Ankara. Graduate: Management, Middle East Technical University
Arda (son): Unemployed. Graduate: Civil Engineering, Boğaziçi University
Aras (son): Works at The Princeton Review, Ankara. Graduate: Civil Engineering, İstanbul Technical University-State University of New York
Fırat (father): Co-owner of ARBA Food Co. Ltd. Graduate: English Language and Literature, Hacettepe University


We have together and individually traveled to a lot of countries all around the world. We love interacting with locals for local foods, traditions, music etc. to further understand ourselves and import new meanings to our own lives, which, in turn, enriches everybody around us.

We have hosted wonderful people. None caused big issues, and none had issues with us. We are more prone to sharing experiences, rather than doing business, because, I guess we are early adopters of Airbnb. Our house is not like an hotel room. With us generally around, you will make the most out of the neighborhood, perhaps İstanbul and maybe even Turkey.

We are also very understanding guests with usually basic needs; but with the taste of certain sociocultural rules, mixed with a certain amount of humor. We basically expect what is written on your page to be correct; because then, we will be aware of the shortcomings as well, and act accordingly.

reviews.txt: The district was very calm, and there were two supermarkets within a minute of walking which can provide whatever you lack. Arda was very kind and helpful, and the house has everything you may need during your accomodation. My only concern was the cat, but she ignores you unless you call her :)
Tek kelimeyle mükemmel diyebilirim, evin toplu taşımaya ve sahile yakın oluşu çok büyük bir avantaj.
A silent room near the Bosphorus. Aras very helpful person. Thank you Aras.
