reviews.txt: A great comfortable little place right smack bang in the centre of circular quay. Contact with host/s was quick and easy too

Our stay in Jared's apartment was exactly what we needed. It's a very comfortable space for two people. There is a big window that provides a nice view of the surroundings and a lovely breeze. We didn't use the rooftop pool (too cold) but it was gorgeous! The kitchen is very small but it's well set out so there is still plenty of bench space. Being on a high floor the hot water doesn't run for particularly long but it's fine if you leave a bit of time between showers. Checking in and out was super easy! The building is in a wonderful location, we walked easily to Haymarket, Darling Harbour, the Rocks, and Circular Quay. TIP: If you are driving into the city, this is not the place to stay. Parking was a nightmare. Jared does warn that parking is expensive (he mentions $69 in the apartment description) but what I didn't realise is it's not just a $69 flat rate for more than three hours, it's $69 the first day, $50 overnight, then $69 for the next day. In the end we just gave up trying to find cheaper parking and paid. Other than that our stay was wonderful. Thank you Jared for being a wonderful host!

The studio's location is very accessible. Its a few minutes walk from both Wynyard and Circular Quay train stations. That was a major win for us. We were able to visit one place in the morning, then return and feed the kids and visit another place in the evening/night. Jared provided us plenty of everything described in the listing.

You can even see Sydney Eye Tower from one of the windows. No balcony though.
很干净,结构布局都很喜欢,如果check in的时间能在灵活一点就好了
It was a great place to stay, awesome location for a good price, and it was a good size for the four of us for four nights. Nice view out the window of the city too

Nice and clean place to stay int he middle of the city
Really recommended!
The location is okay and safe.
Great great location! Lovely little thank you note too. The place was spotless and had everything we needed!
Good Host
房东非常热情和友好,公寓的地理位置也很好,走路就可以到很多景区,公寓有厨房,可以自己做饭｡一次不错的居住体验｡

Great communication from Jared at the time of booking and leading up to our stay.  The apartment was perfect for us as our weekend was spent mainly in the Rocks and Circular Quay area which was about a 5 minute walk.

Pub across the road has all the sports channels (perfect during finals footy) and does a pretty good meal as well.

There is a little noise in the morning from the Light Rail project works but overall value for money and location were perfect.
Great place in the middle of the CBD. Checking in was super easy and communication with the host was spot on. Great value when you consider what a room of similar size in a nearby hotel would cost.

The location was great for our interests.  We literally walked everywhere we wanted to go and we got around.  There are so many great things to see near Mezzo's Studio.  Our check-in and check-out were easy and our requests were handled in a helpful and friendly manner.  I highly suggest this location and the price can't be beat!
房东的房子在悉尼cbd｡位置非常好｡我们转了几天才发现他四通八达｡大门非常有范儿｡房间内设施齐全｡是个好房子!

Thank you for consistent communication and reliable contact. 
The presentation and location of this property is excellent.
Given the location, it was good value for the cost. We had issues with the elevator, but that can't be fixed by the host.

A smooth pre-stay process with an easy check-in and out procedure. We were a bit late arriving due to flight delays but that was no problem. There were a couple of hiccups that were dealt with quickly and I believe will be sorted for future guests as a result. 
Fabulous location (a bit of street noise, but that's what you get being in the centre of the city!) and I felt safe in the apartment which was comfortable.

If your are spending time in circular quay or the rocks this place is well located for the price. It accommodates 4 people with the fold out bed and has everything you need. Our arrival was easy and communication was great. The place does need a really good clean, other than that this was a great pick.

Location was good and price was reasonable, but I would not stay here again.

The television only had three channels that worked and none of the lights in the kitchen were functional (so I didn't even try to cook or use anything in the kitchen, thus can't be sure if the appliances work). The bathroom flooded when you took a shower no matter how careful you were, which is probably why there was a lot of mold in the bathroom, particular between the sink and shower. In general, the unit was quite dirty.

The location is unbeatable. Bathroom needs an update but other than that we truly enjoyed our stay. 
Ate breakfast looking out to the city and enjoyed some sunshine at the rooftop pool. Quiet building mostly businesses so no waiting for elevator. And it was more than enough room when my parents joined us for a few days.
Host was very prompt to respond to inquiries and worked with us on our early arrival. 2 big thumbs up!

name: Charming apartment in Santa Teresa
summary: Recently refurbished 3 bedroom apartment in the bohemian neighbourhood of Santa Teresa in Rio de Janeiro. This airy and light apartment is close to many trendy bars, restaurants and cafes and has a supermarket 5 minutes walk away.
interaction: I'll be contactable through Airbnb at any time if you have any questions though please note I am based in the UK.
houseRules: No pets. No smoking.

host.about: I am a Brazilian/Italian national who has lived in London for the last 30 years. I speak English, Portuguese, Italian and Spanish fluently and like the rest of the world, I love travelling and meeting people from different parts of the world. Other interests include foreign film, reading, astrology and working out (pilates and yoga).

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: El departamento es muy acogedor, su decoración es cálida y bonita. Cuenta con 4 dormitorios y  camas para 5 personas, tiene una buena pieza de cocina y artefactos  para preparar comidas (aunque sólo tomamos desayuno ahí) , un baño bueno y un medio baño (WC) que es un apoyo, pero requiere cierta ventilación directa, que hoy día no tiene.

Fantastic, spacious, warm, comfortable and centrally located apartment.  With excellent bars and cafes just around the corner, we loved the location.  A short easy stroll to the main restaurant area and tourist shops. We didn't use the local supermarket as purchased stuff down by the metro and took a taxi up the hill.  The photos are very good and show just what the apartment is like.  Branca and Tereza were very helpful and responsive to questions.  Would definitely stay again if we ever get the chance.  Thank you.

Eu amei muito a estadia no apartamento de Branca! Super lindo, a decoração maravilhosa, super limpo e com uma vista maravilhosa! Branca foi uma ótima anfitriã, sua amiga Tereza também, que nos deu um ótimo suporte, dicas de passeios e nos tratou super bem. Recomendo muito e espero voltar outras vezes.

Branca's flat is great! It's in a wonderful around up in the Bohemian neighborhood of Santa Teresa. We were there during carnival- it had great proximity to the blocos without being right in them. The flat had plenty of space and Branca and Wanderley made sure we had everything we needed at all times. Would recommend 100%!!

Branca's apartment is very well located in charming Santa Teresa, with incredible views of the city. Everything is very clean and well-organized. Wanderley, the apartment manager, is super friendly and responsive. He sat down with me at check-in and helped orient me on the map. We had a lovely time here and would certainly come back!
El mejor apartamento en el mejor barrio administrados por los mejores anfitriones. Todo 10 puntos!

El apartamento es un sueño:  ambientes amplios, exquisita decoración y preciosa vista a la ciudad, gracias a su ubicación en el mejor barrio de Río: Santa Teresa! Banca y Wanderley fueron excelentes anfitriones y respondieron a todas nuestras inquietudes e hicieron nuestra estadía allí perfecta. Muchas gracias por todo!

name: Large 3 bedrooms apartment
summary: This favourite home offers a huge balcony, lots of space, easy life, all the comfort you need and a fantastic location! The beach is only 3 minutes away. Metro is 2 blocks away (starting august 2016).
interaction: During your stay, I'll be generally available if you have any questions - just call, text or email.
houseRules: -No smoking in the flat please, but you can smoke on the balcony!  - I would appreciate if you can treat it as your own place. - No parties allowed. - Be considerate of neighbours. - Please, turn off all ACs when leaving the house. - I will be as accommodating as possible for early check-ins or late check-outs. - All guests must be confirmed, and no additional guests are allowed.

host.about: Born in London, raised in Rio, living in Lisbon. Love to travel around the world, to meet new people and their culture.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Luísa é uma pessoa muito correta e preocupada com a boa estadia. Apartamento aconchegante e perto da praia.
Luísa é excelente pessoa muita atenciosa, seu apartamento é bem aconchegante e perto da praia. Voltarei em breve
Luísa é excelente pessoa, o apartamento é muito bem localizado e amplo.  E 01 quadra da praia.
Excelente imóvel, bem localizado e aconchegante e proprietária muito atenciosa. Voltarei
Ótimo imóvel, uma Quadra da praia e próximo de farmácia e supermercado.

Ótimo imóvel aconchegante e próximo do melhor ponto da orla.
A anfitriã é muito atenciosa, voltaria em outra oportunidade.

name: Private Room (2)  in Guest House at Coogee Beach
summary: Room 2  Private room in charming recently renovated federation guest house at Coogee Beach. Prices are per room for 2 People only. A queen  and a single bed. Not suitable for group booking All rooms have  TV, desk, wardrobe, beds, unlimited wifi 2 mins from the beach, cafes and transport. This is not a party house but a safe and clean place to stay. Share bathrooms and kitchen... All common areas are cleaned daily.
interaction: I am happy to provide advice on local restaurants and travel tips.
houseRules: Leave it as you found it! Clean :)

host.about: Welcoming host who wants you to enjoy the beautiful surrounds at Coogee Beach

reviews.txt: My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)

David introduced himself almost immediately on arrival and made me feel welcome. Place was exactly as posted. Other guests were interesting, courteous and helpful. Room was comfortable as was the bed. Large, easy share kitchen well organized and clean. The only negative (for me with recent hip replacement surgery) was all hand washing sinks except kitchen sink were one flight of stairs down. Immediate neighborhood pretty residential. Commerce and Coogee Beach just a short walk.
David was a very nice and hepful host, we loved it to stay in his Apartment :) it was always clean and tidy.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

When I arrived at Sydney, I received David's message about our arrival time, and let us know the room is ready. The house of David is very easy to find. The house is big. The manager helped us to check in and introduced the use of the house in detail.The room is very big. The bed and storage space are large, The room is tidy and have a TV, even though our English is not very good, Johnny patiently explain for us.There are a lot of rooms. The kitchen has adequate facilities.The tenant from Brazil and France, and all people are very friendly, liking to chat. You can know many friends here, in addition to go out a few steps to reach the beach. The scenery is very beautiful.There are a lot of lines, bus station to attractions which is very convenient.Johnny is very keen to send us to the destination when we leave. The people are very good and here is a very worth to stay.David and Johnny are nice, and I hope I can come here again next time.

The house is a big house shared by usually long term tenants (months to years). All of them have been lovely and made me feel very welcome even if I was there for a short amount of time. 
The room was immense and everything was super clean. 
The location is perfect for access to Coogee beach and multiple food options. Many buses options also to go to CBD.
All in all probably one of the best air BnB I've been to.
great experience!

David’s place is full of really nice guests and very close to bars, cafes, shops, transport and beaches. We loved staying here, the place is well equipped with cooking and cleaning facilities. Only downside is the slow Wi-Fi but I believe David is already on the case! Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to visit Sydney but wants to stay near the coast!

name: Bondi-Tamarama BEACHFRONT Apartment
summary: This gorgeous 3-bedroom apartment is directly across the road from the beach. It's very light, beautifully decorated and all within minutes of Bondi, Bronte, restaurants, shops and buses to the CBD. Watch the waves as you have a drink on the balcony.
interaction: Unfortunately, we don't get to meet the guests. We leave keys outside in a 'lockbox' which allows you to collect them whenever you arrive. We usually stay nearby and are available in the event that you need help with anything.
houseRules: Please be mindful of our neighbours and leave our home as you found it :)

host.about:
Hi there,

My name's Wayne. I live in Sydney, Australia with my fiancé, Kate.

I'm a management consultant, an author, a commercial helicopter pilot and I've recently developed a real love of travel with time in LA, Turkey, Greece, London, Vietnam, Thailand, Camboodia, Bali, Hong Kong and France all in the last 12 months.

We've done quite a lot of share living both at home and abroad so we'd like to think we know what makes a good environment in a home.

Hope to meet you soon!

Wayne and Kate

reviews.txt:
The apartment exceeded expectations.  
First, the location was incredible.  Literally overlooking the Tamarama beach and a beautifull balcany to sit on and watch the world go by.  
Secondly, the apartment itself was perfect.  It is clean, with great entertaining spaces and very welcoming.  You don't feel like your invading another persons home but it still feels homely - if that makes sense!  The beds, couch and linen were all clean, fresh and comfortable.
Third, it's only a 10 min walk to Bondi!
Finally, Wayne is lovely and immediately responded to all my questions.  We only booked the apartment a few days before, and it was my first time dealing with airbnb, so we really appreciated the quick responses.  Also, we had a bottle of champagne and chocolates on arrival which was a lovely surprise!
I would highly recommend this apartment.  It is the perfect place for people who want to hang out, relax and and enjoy one of Sydney's premier beach locations.  
I will definitely go back if I need a place in Sydney.

We had a great stay at Wayne and Kate's place. We travelled to Sydney for a family long weekend and from the moment we opened the door we felt at home. Their home is open and airy with a fantastic view of the beach. The location is perfect, we went on walks along the "ocean walk" to Bondi and the opposite direction to Coogee and Bronte. It was great sitting on the balcony looking out at the beach and the many energetic people pounding the pavements and in the water enjoying the waves. Wayne and Kate were great hosts emailing and messaging us with directions to their home and suggestions of places to visit. Nothing was too much trouble. The champagne and chocolate they left for us was also well received . We can not wait to return. Thankyou Wayne and Kate for sharing your beautiful home with us.

Wayne and Kate were wonderful to deal with, quick responses in the lead-up to our stay and comprehensive instructions on how to get the key when we arrived. As soon as we walked in we knew we were in for a lovely stay. The view is magnificent and the apartment is spacious and airy, and well-represented in the photos on the website. The kids loved the big TV which meant more time on the deck for us! Great walks and easy parking which is not easy to come by in Sydney. Would thoroughly recommend this place.

Holy moly what an apartment. Actually better than the photos! The vibe is clean, open, breezy, sophisticated. After a picnic lunch at Bronte, We enjoyed dinner together at the table and an evening swim. We were a party of 6, and all of us slept comfortably and felt like a million dollars the entire time. The kitchen was awesome to cook in and the balcony a peaceful breakfast spot. It could not have been more perfect.

Everything went smoothly and Wayne and Kate were very easy to deal with. The apartment is stunning, wonderful views of the beach, and although I only spent the afternoon there, my Mum and her friends who stayed over found everything they needed and were raving about the location. I'll be back! :)

We had an absolutely wonderful time staying at Wayne and Kate's place.. you cannot beat waking up to the sounds of the ocean! We had friends travelling from overseas for our wedding, and we could not have asked for a better place to stay; 2-10 mins walk to any of Sydney's great beaches, and all the anemities that you need in an apartment to make the place as comfortable as possible. Wayne and Kate were fantastic in getting back to us on any inquiries and were very thoughtful and approachable. The perfect hosts! now we need another excuse to rent out the place again ;) Thanks for everything!

We had a great time staying at Wayne and Kate's place. It is an absolutely beautiful apartment in an amazing spot. It was great to fall asleep listening to the sea.
Me and 5 girlfriends stayed for a weekend and we were all blown away. The apartment had everything we needed, we just added a few bottles of champers to sip on the balcony and soak up the Tamarama atmosphere. 
Thanks Wayne and Kate :)

From the first contact with Wayne and Kate my first experience using AirBNB has been fabulous! Their regular and thoughtful communication was perfect and we were so excited to stay at their beautiful apartment overlooking Tamarama Beach. We arrived to find cold bubbles in the fridge, a block of chocolate and a 'house and area manual' to assist use with everything we needed to know during our stay. The apartment was perfect! Great size for a larger group and it was so nice to have the home comforts right at our fingertips. I cannot recommend this experience enough and look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate's apartment again in the near future!

We had a wonderful stay at Wayne and Kate's Tamarama apartment. Excellent communication and experience from the very start. Checking in was simple and we arrived to a lovely bottle of bubbles! The view and location are absolutely unbeatable, and the apartment is terrific. The photos do not do justice - it's an amazing apartment! Great lighting, very comfortable, and well furnished. The flat has all the amenities you need and truly makes you feel at home.  

We had a very small issue with the internet dropping out periodically but Kate went above and beyond to ensure things were fixed.  And… left us another bottle of bubbles for our troubles, which was so incredibly nice!

The apartment was a short walk to Bondi, Bronte and Coogee beaches.  The walk from Tamarama to Bondi is breathtaking.  We were lucky enough to catch the Sculptures by the Sea the week of our stay.

Our experience was outstanding and highly recommend Wayne and Kate’s place. We did not want to leave! We look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate’s in the future. Thanks again for everything, Wayne and Kate!  :)

Fantastic spot although the weather was not on our side!

I arrived late on the weekend, so Wayne and Kate were super accommodating with my friend John. Place is very secure, has an amazing outlook over the beach. Café’s and restaurants are a short walk away, and transport easily accessible. 

Great experience and would love to stay there again!
Thanks Wayne and Kate we had a lovely time at your apartment. Was clean, beds comfy and great view of the beach!!

What an absolutely fantastic apartment and view! The hosts were fantastic to deal with and gave quick and very helpful replies! The apartment had everything we could need for a girly weekend away. Thanks so much, we all had a ball =)
Wayne and Kate's apartment is in a fabulous location right on the beach of Tamarama. It is clean, well maintained and suited our needs with 2 teenage boys. Thumbs up!

We had a great time, the apartment was lovely, clean, the views were spectacular and all expectations from the posting were met! They even left us bubbly!
The owners were very kind and even left us tips for the area.
I recommend this apartment and experience highly.

-Boyana

Absolutely perfect place to stay in Sydney! The beach is quite literally, across the road! The views are to die for day and night. Short and beautiful walk to Bondi or Bronte for restaurants, bars and bigger beaches if you want them. The apartment is clean and very comfortable,  it has everything and more you could want. And the hosts are extremely kind and accommodating. We had a ball staying here!

Wayne and Kate’s beachfront apartment is simply amazing. From the moment we made an inquiry about the place, Wayne and Kate went above and beyond when responding to our questions and requests regarding the place – even replying within minutes when we sent a message at midnight!

Stepping foot into the place, you might have to take a second to realise that you’re not actually in a designer home magazine. All of the amenities are in great condition and all three of the bedrooms were large with the beds comfortable and extremely clean.

After settling in and making a cup of tea and coffee with the stocked kitchen, we decided to take a look at the lengthy list of activities that Wayne and Kate had compiled just for us. You can never undervalue local knowledge!

While Wayne and Kate’s place is extremely fun, it’s also the perfect place to get some work done. We popped down to Tamarama Beach Café (across the road!) and bought back some coffee and sat and worked at the breakfast bar overlooking Tamarama Beach with our laptops – using the speedy wifi that was provided, of course.

Simply, Wayne and Kate are amazing hosts and their stunning apartment is perfect for work, play and everything in between!

We loved staying at Wayne and Kate's beautiful apartment right on the beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished and we felt right at home. Wayne and Kate were fantastic hosts and were in regular contact to make us feel welcome. We can't stress enough how good the location is, being able to walk across the road for a swim at a moments notice is amazing. Highly recommended!
Beautiful location, nice hosts, close to Bondi and Bronte for cafés and restaurants. We had a great time! Thanks Kate and Wayne.
Wonderful apartment and extremely responsive hosts. Wish I were back on the beach!

Fantastic apartment, fantastic location, fantastic hosts! Everything was thought of for us and we had a wonderful stay. The best equipped apartment we have ever stayed in...enough of everything, and more!
 thanks guys!  xx

name: Cozy Room w/ Office | The Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: The Plateau Mont-Royal: At once, Quiet, Cozy, and Lively.  - Beautiful Parcs. - Great Places to Eat & Drink. - In proximity to Downtown, the Mile-End, and the Old Port. See the 'Interactive Map' for nearby Eateries. Ask me directly for additional information!
interaction: I work a lot, but can help you navigate the city and suggest places to visit, eat, drink, and have fun. I'm generally around on the weekends, so we'll likely cross paths.
houseRules: *Smoking on balconies only. **Feel free to invite guests during your stay.  But be reasonably quiet after 11pm.

host.about:
Easy-going, average cook, and continuing education (Urban Planning).
Interests include: Cities, Landscapes, Gardening, Music, and other things.

Just looking to provide you with a cozy retreat.

reviews.txt: Shane welcomed us in with open arms, he was very friendly and helpful. Stayed up to chat with us, suggested some places for us, and worked very hard to be sure we were having a good stay. First thing he did when we walked in the door was offer us food. Cozy, affordable, and pretty close to a lot of cool stuff.

Le gars est brillant! Et l'appart tout autant;  on s'y sent, immmmédiatement comme chez soi. "Hautement recommandé", si on veut non seulement dormir quelque part, mais rencontrer quelqu'un.

The guy is brilliant, and the house too. Feel immediatly at home. Highly recommended. Opportunity to sleep somewhere and to meet a human being. Thank you Shane!

Shane was a GREAT host.  When my father and I arrived, there was a lack of bed space for the two of us and Shane voluntarily gave up his bed so that we could be comfortable.  He went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay.  I felt safe and secure and was able to live according to my odd schedule and hours without any problems !

Nice, Nice, Nice. European and artistic but well organized and covenient house. Perfect location. A block away from great street filled with international restraunts and grocery stores. While you arw enjoying the scene, you will get to the Metro or Bixie bikes. I did write this because of Shane. He is a kind and good guy. He will give you a full support while you are staying his place. So have a nice time!!

Shane was a a great host. He is very accommodating, communicative and fluent in both French and English. I never felt I was intruding in his space and I felt at ease sharing his kitchen and bathroom. His place is situated in a quiet neighborhood that is safe, charming and short commute to downtown. It is a short walk from his place to restaurants, bars and shopping (produce and clothing). I highly recommend this listing.
Shane was very helpful and amenable with check in time. The apartment is very clean, spacious and centrally located to food and drink. We loved our time in Montreal and Shane was very helpful!

Shane was an AWESOME host! I couldn't have asked for anything better; the place was cozy, close enough to everything I needed (I did have a Bixi membership for the month though which was also great), and I felt perfectly comfortable and safe. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone :)
Un grand merci à Shane pour sa disponibilité et sa fiabilité ! Logement très bien situé et agréable.

name: 2 Bedroom Ocean Front Condo in Honokowai - Sleeps 6 - Hale Mahina #B404
summary: This elegant 2 bedroom, loft style unit has its semi-private master bedroom and bathroom upstairs and guest bedroom downstairs. Features bamboo flooring in the loft bedroom, tile in the living areas and carpet in the guest bedroom. The guest bedroom has a stall shower only, no bath tub but there is a shower-tub in the master bedroom.
interaction: Chase N Rainbows is located in Lahaina Town and is open 7 days per week: M-F 7am to 5pm, Sat/Sun 8am to 4pm. There is also an agent available for after hours emergencies.
houseRules: This Rental Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into by the undersigned guest (“Guest” or “you” or “yours”) and Chase ‘N Rainbows Real Estate, Inc. (“Manager”). You understand that Manager is the designated agent of the owner of the Unit (“Owner”) and is signing this Agreement as the agent of the Owner, and on behalf of and with authority from the Owner. This Agreement incorporates by reference the terms and conditions set forth in your Deposit Confirmation Letter. House Rules: A full listing of the House Rules pertaining to your condo/property is attached to this rental agreement and is also located in the red binder left open on the dining table when you enter the unit upon check in. Please review these house rules as there may be warnings followed by penalties if violated.  This reservation is for quiet residential vacation accommodations only. Therefore, parties, receptions, luaus, events, and gatherings of any kind are strictly prohibited. No additional people beyond the maximum oc

host.about:
Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based, family-owned company established in 1980 with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. For the past twenty years, CNR has been offering visitors and Kama’aina alike, affordable and luxury accommodations at a very competitive price. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. These condominiums come highly recommended by leisure, business, and family travelers with distinctive tastes. A significant number of satisfied, return guests speak for the company’s service commitment and quality product. Chase ‘N Rainbows is a proud member of the Hawaii Visitors & Convention Bureau (HVCB), The American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA), Maui Visitors Bureau (MVB), Hawaii Association of Realtors, Maui Chamber of Commerce, and Vacation Rental Managers Association (VRMA).

*Please note we are a licensed and bonded professional management company and we DO NOT advertise on Craig s List

reviews.txt: Everything was exactly as promised or better. This was a wonderful location in a family friendly setting.  We would stay here again for future visits.

name: Ranch Abode Loft in Bushwick
summary: Simply appointed and centrally located 1st floor apt with 20 ft. ceilings, a loft bed, and exposed brick in the bathroom.
interaction: I'm available any-time via phone if you need me.
houseRules: - Enjoy yourself and please ask any questions you may have!  - Please be respectful of the neighbors and community. This is their home.  - Turn off lights and heat or AC when you are out of the apartment and make sure to turn off when you leave:)

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Hello! I am a Brooklyn based film, television, video producer and director. I am originally from a small town in New Mexico. I travel all of the time and have had a wonderful time renting to other traveling airbnb'ers! Looking forward to meeting you!

reviews.txt: Shannon's apartment was left lovely and clean with plenty of towels and bedding, the place was huge and it was a pleasure to stay there.

Shannon was very helpful and flexible, available for questions whenever I had them. Her apartment is gorgeous, just as described and very clean and spacious. The apartment complex is also really cool, and we were lucky enough to meet some of the other lovely residents during our stay. The location near the myrtle JMZ train station was so convenient. We had a fantastic time here.

I only hope that every airbnb host is as friendly and efficient as Shannon. We couldn't have asked for a better stay in her lovely apartment. It was clean, spacious, fully stocked with linen/bathroom supplies and super close to the JMZ train line. Thanks so much Shannon, it made the trip that much easier.

we spent a great time in the appartment of shannon. everything we needed was there- perfect kitchen, lots of fresh towels and sheats, very interesting building with billiard, ping pong,etc.downstairs. perfect subway station to everywhere nearby. nice delis around. perfect for a new york brooklyn trip - not the snobby one.
thank you shannon

Shannon is so cool ! And her loft is conveniently located for almost everything. Very close to the subway station,bars.restaurants,and delis. She helped me,and my girlfriend to find things to do nearby, She also took good care of us. I would stay at her place again and again.
Wonderful apartment, great hostess.
Great space in an amazing area. Very unique.

Appartement très bien placé, au carrefour de Brooklyn (Bushwick-Williamsburg) et Manhattan. Très bien déservit par le métro et les bus.

Ce qui nous a plu est la vie de quartier très populaire sans aucun souci, gens sympathiques toujours près à aider ou renseigner (comme partout ailleurs à NYC )

I had a really great time at Shannons Apartment. Everything was perfect and everything was there to feel like home. Shannon is a very nice person and i hope to be there very soon again. Thank you for all.

Shannon's Appartment is amazing. 

The place is in a great location within walking distance from two subway lines, great restaurants, 24 hour fresh produce and deli, close to good clothing shops and a quick 15minute subway ride to everything manhattan has to offer. 

The bed is comfortable, the kitchen is well stocked, the games room is good fun and the rooftop is jaw dropping. 

Shannon is a great host, she had plenty of good recommendations to help us get the most out of bushwick and it's surrounding neighborhoods. And she was incredibly accommodating towards our crazy 2am arrival! (Thanks for waiting up Shannon!)

If your looking for a more unique stay in New York, away from the swarms of tourists in Manhattan then this is the perfect place to base yourself. 

10/10 could not fault the place.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay at Shannon's loft. Shannon was extremely friendly and considerate, and she was very reachable when we had questions. I felt safe in the building, and the room suited the two of us just fine. Loved the book collection. No pool balls in the common room, but we just played ping pong instead. 

The location is extremely convenient - just a couple minutes walk to subway. We were able to get all over NYC easily and it was great to come back, relax and cook a nice meal at the end of the day at the loft. We would definitely stay here again - wish I lived here!
Perfect. Great location. Great host.

Shannon's place was great, just like the home I would want in NYC. I used to live in Manhattan years ago and I was visiting with my girlfriend for the New Years. It was her first trip to the U.S. and she wanted to see New York, a real, authentic, and old New York. Bushwick is that right now. It's hip, arty, and with just enough grit to make it feel like you're in New York not the theme park that tourists end up going to. Her apartment is close to trains, some great restaurants and grocery stores, and the building is really cool. We mostly stayed out, but when we stayed in we could cook and watch Netflix like we were home. I can not stress how comfy she has made it. I really felt like I was home. I would highly recommend Shannon's place and would love to stay there again

Shannon's place was perfect.  Not too sparse, not too cluttered.  A great loft experience.  Location is great - subway two blocks away and the Citibike station only 3 blocks away.  Shannon was very easy to deal with, quick to respond and was a pro at hosting.  Hope to stay here again!
OK:)

Shannon était en déplacement, mais nous avons pu facilement la contacter, et avons été reçu par une amie qui nous a donné les clefs. Nous avons pu avoir les informations qui nous manquaient par mail ou par téléphone avec Shannon.
L'appartement correspond à la description, un des couchage est sur une mezzanine au dessus d'un lit 2 places. Le Building est très sympa, c'est super pratique de pouvoir faire ses lessives, et de pouvoir répéter son instrument (pour les musiciens) au sous-sol!
Le quartier est typique, c'est agréable d'être les seuls touristes, de pouvoir se sentir immergé.  C'est un quartier authentique et populaire, mais on s'y sent en sécurité. Il y a des commerces à proximité.
The place is very nice, big, clean and stylish. We really enjoyed our week and Shannon helped us very quickly when we had questions, thanks a lot!

For our first time in New York, it was somewhat courageous of us to live like locals, deep in the neighborhood of Bushwick, Brooklyn.  It took some adjusting for us to hang out in the area.  The area is considered 'gritty' which is extremely true. I cant stress that enough. It is dirty, you might be bothered for spare change, you might be asked to swipe your metro card for someone,  however the area does have some of the coolest restaurants in the city. But you must go looking for them, otherwise you will only find corner deli's that don't take international credit cards and random pawn shops etc.  We actually loved our experience at Shannon's though. Shannon's studio was great. Lots of space for two. The only complaints we had were that the walls were paper thin and it was all around a bit dirty. We washed the dishes before using them since they were dusty and just kept a fan at night to block out noise. We also could not reach Shannon until the day of our reservation and had to wait past check in time to get the keys. Once we were in contact, Shannon was super nice and helpful. The roof top is amazing! You can see some of Manhatten's skyline. The subway takes about half an hour to get to Manhatten , once you are there, probably another 15 to wherever you want to go. It is nice to get away from the zoo of Manhatten, I strongly recommend staying in Brooklyn, it's gives you more of a well rounded experience.  For us, this was great, we loved the experience of what it would be like to live there.

Shannon's apartment was fantastic. A great location super close to the subway and to plenty of delicious spots to eat and drink, this apartment provided us with a very relaxing place to take a break from the hustle and bustle of the city while still remaining close enough to get back it when rested. A great price for such a fantastic location would make this apartment a no-brainer for any future trips we take to New York. Thanks for such a great place!

The accommodation was very good, we liked the neighborhood very much even though is a little gray in contrast to other areas. Brooklyn, however is a neighborhood that is being transformed. It takes about 30 minutes to get to Manhattan, but worth staying in Brooklyn and explore this part of the city. Shannon's attention was good although not met, although slow to respond to messages so you have to take that into account. The apartment was clean, but the building was not.

Undoubtedly it is a good option to stay especially if you're a tourist and you want concoer both Manhattan and Brooklyn.

name: King Size Private Bedroom in Surry Hills
summary: Welcome to Surry Hills! Private room with a King size bed close to the CBD, Oxford Street, Central Station and Hyde Park. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the location and the homeliness. There is a fully equipped kitchen with Nespresso machine and breakfast essentials. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
interaction: I live in the house and I'm a professional working in the city so you have the place to yourselves during the day. I'm friendly and easy-going and I'm happy to give you ideas for things to do whilst in this great city.

host.about:
Hi, I'm Hayley. I moved from the UK to Australia in November 2015 with my boyfriend and we love living in Surry Hills.
I'm very active; I enjoy the gym, running in Centennial Park and exploring all of the great walks around NSW and beyond. I volunteer for a women's charity and I'm also a Girl Guides leader.
I love to cook but with the variety of amazing restaurants on our doorstep it's hard to not eat out all the time!
As both a guest and host I'm polite, considerate and tidy. I like for our guests to feel at home when they stay with us - so if there's anything you need, just ask.

reviews.txt: We had a great stay here. Hayley was very easy to communicate with prior to our arrival. The room was spotless and comfortable and the breakfast/coffee was very much appreciated. The central location was perfect for our weekend in the city.

The room was just as described, and was in a perfect location in the heart of Surry Hills.  Getting to the CBD, or walking around the neighborhood were so easy from the apartment.

Hayley and Jack made my stay really pleasant, with lots of amenities and insights into the neighborhood and Sydney in general.  They even went out of my way helping me get to my next location.  Couldn't recommend them enough.
Comfortable place to stay, good kitchen facilities, easy access to transport and nearby supermarket, places to eat etc.
My boyfriend was in Sydney for a job interview. Hayley was a great host. The location was perfect as well.
Clean and comfortable lodgings, the hosts made me feel welcome. It's a relaxed household and I'm a returning guest. My preferred place to stay in Surry Hills.

This is a cute little cottage in the heart of Surry Hills close to Oxford Street and Central Station 
Hosts were friendly and made me feel very welcome with brekky provided in the mornings 
All necessary info was given to me before hand and  any questions I had were promptly answered
Arrangements were made to provide a key for my arrival when they could not make themselves available
Jack and Hayley were great hosts. I felt welcome, the room was comfortable. No problems at all.
Hayley and Jack made me feel very welcome. Everything about the listing was accurate and it was a great location and neighbourhood.
Jack and Hayley are awesome. Down to earth. Welcoming. Made us feel at home. Would def stay there again.
Hayley & Jack we're very easy & friendly hosts who I would stay with again.

The location was great, comfortable bed, close to nice cafes and restaurants, easy walk into the city and to central station.  The only issue was the parking, however we parked in a secure car park which was only a 10min walk from the accommodation.  Would definitely stay again.  Thank you Hayley.
Very nice host and room, comfort bed, clean bathroom. House is near byaround museum station of airport link, and there are a lot of good restaurants around.:)
該房間的地點非常好,兩位主人也非常貼心,若再次前往雪梨,我們依然會入住
They were awesome and very accomodating.  Highly recommended

Jack and Hayley have a wonderfully located, comfortable apartment right in the middle of the city. I was able to walk almost anywhere and when that wasn't an option Jack was available to give me some tips on how to reach where I wanted to go (Bus and Train Stations are close by). The place itself is very clean and would definitely stay there and/or recommend it to other people staying in Sydney.
Great location and super easy to organise, check in etc.
Very helpful and warm-hearted hosts. Very good journey in Sydney with the perfect accommodation they have provided.
Hayley & Jack were very welcoming and friendly. The location was great, comfortable room and clean bathroom. Would highly recommend and stay again if we were in Sydney.
Super séjour, maison bien située et très propre!
Jack and Hayley were very accommodating, friendly and easy going. Loved the location and the room was just lovely!

name: FloresRooms 3T
summary: FloresRooms esta situado no coração da cidade do Porto. Tem disponível Internet por wireless e TV por cabo, como maquina de café , frigorífico e micro-ondas.
interaction: A sua chegada e durante a sua estadia estarei sempre disponível para o receber e dar-lhe algumas dicas sobre a vida da cidade.
houseRules: Se fumar, só pedimos que o faça na varanda.

reviews.txt:
A casa está otimamente bem localizada, perfeito para quem quer conhecer a baixa da cidade a pé. O apartamento está como novo e, apesar de próximo dos locais mais frequentados ao fim de semana, é muito sossegado.
Recomendo e com certeza que vou voltar.

Excelente experiência!
Voltaremos de certeza :)

A localização do apartamento é excelente! Tivemos duas noites muito sossegadas, não houve mesmo barulho nenhum no prédio. A cama é confortável, a casa de banho é decente (há secador). A limpeza impressionou-nos imediatamente!

Muy buena elección!!andreia esta pendiente en todo momento y te hace sentir como en casa, el apartamento en el centro de Oporto y todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en la ciudad, tal y como aparece en las fotos, para dormir no se escuchaba un solo ruido y todo muy nuevo. 100% recomendable!!

Andreia foi muito amavel e disponobilizou tudo que necessario no apartamento. O Apartamento é moderno, impecável e no centro do Porto . Sem duvida recomendo. Andreia was very helpful and had everything you need in the apartment. It was modern, impeccable and right in the city centre. Highly recommended!

El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos, muy limpio y acogedor. Con microondas, nevera, cafetera nespresso y había café, fruta... Andreia trabaja en la cafetería que hay debajo por lo que es fácil encontrarla si hay cualquier problema. La calle en la que está el apartamento es peatonal con tiendas y cafeterias en pleno centro pero lo bueno es que la habitación da a una zona interior por lo que no se oye ningún ruido.  Lo recomendamos sin ninguna duda!
Nos encantó el apartamento, céntrico, muy limpio y Andrea se porto muy bien con nosotros. Gracias por todo

Recomendo a todos se hospedarem com a Andréia.
Muito simpática e receptiva. Excelente apartamento e localização.

This is a small and very comfortable apartment. The location is excellent. It is just one minute walk to metro and train station. And it is located in a central area. Andrea is very nice and helpful. She responses every email I sent very quickly and provides all the information I need. I would choose to stay at this apartment again next time if I travelled there.

Andreia es una muy buena anfitriona, el departamento es justo como se muestra en las imágenes, está en el centro, muy cerca de una estación de metro, nos encanto hospedarnos allí, Andreia nos proporcionó una hoja con los lugares más representativos de Oporto, nos atendió muy bien !

Ce studio est idéalement placé dans le centre de Porto. Il est suffisant pour une courte durée, très propre et dispose du nécessaire. Tout correspondait à nos attentes et au descriptif / photos, donc nickel ! Andreia nous a bien reçu et reste disponible pendant le séjour. 
Andreia obrigado por tudo, Florence

Accueil agréable, appartement très fonctionnel, très propre. Bien situé en centre ville et près des transports en commun. Vraiment rien à redire. C'était notre première expérience en AirBnB donne envie de revenir. Pour nous cela a été un séjour fantastique.
La casa es tal como se describe en el anuncio, estupenda y muy bien ubicada. La anfitriona encantadora.Recomiendo este alojamiento sin duda, para repetir!

Departamento cómodo y muy bien ubicado.
Andreia fue muy amable antes y durante mi estadía.

Andreia est vraiment quelque de très sympathique et à l'écoute. Elle nous a tout de suite mis à l'aise et a pu répondre à toutes nos questions sur le logement mais aussi sur la ville. l'appartement très bien placé, tout près de la Gare Sao Bento. Les photos correspondent tout à fait à la réalité, appart bien agencé et très pratique. Le balcon est très appréciable et le quartier est assez calme le soir.
Gostamos muito de ficar na rua das flores da Andreia. Muito moderno, práctico e confortável. Igual como aparece nas (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendamos!

Quartier central, animé à l'extérieur mais le logement était très calme.
Normalement Andreia travaille juste en bas mais comme c'était son jour de congé c'est une amie qui nous a reçus.

Andreias Studio is on a very central and easy to reach spot! We really enjoyed having breakfast in your restaurant ;-) thanks a lot!
Also cool to have a balcony, a perfect hideout for two ;-)

We stayed at this apartment for 3 nights , it is modern with all necessary amenities, nice and clean. The main advantage is that it's in centre of historical porto most of the places you can visit in short time. Also many restaurants nearby.

Anfitriã Andreia, uma pessoa dedicada, simpática e solicita, pronta para atender suas necessidades. Tive uma estada excelente. Localização muito boa, perto de tudo para quem vai conhecer ou voltar ao Porto. Região com tudo de que se precisa, inclusive o silêncio para as noites de bons sonos. Excelente relação preço x benefícios.

name: 2BR, Walk to the Beach, 2 Lanais, Stunning Views!
summary: Come visit beautiful Kihei! We're located at the Maui Sunset, close to family-friendly activities, public transport, and Kihei nightlife. You’ll love the complex amenities, renovated kitchen, walking distance beach access and the open, airy and light decor. This 4th floor condo has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (both with showers, no bath), wifi, and 2 lanais that are perfect for watching sunsets and sunrises. Great place for couples, friends who want a home away from home, and families (with kids).
interaction: Your keys will be waiting at the main office when you arrive. Check in time is 3pm, check out time is 11am. Our local property managers are available for any concerns that come up during your stay. I am available via AirBnb messenger at all times.
houseRules: - Check-in is after 3PM -Check-out is by 11am - Follow property rules - Quiet hours from 10PM (when pool closes) to 8AM - Do not remove bedding or supplies from unit

reviews.txt:
This condo was in a very convenient location, near shopping, beaches, and grocery stores. Very nice well-kept condo complex and a fantastic pool. Good AC that kept the condo comfortable.

This was our first visit to Maui and it was great! When we visit Maui again we would absolutely stay here again. Condo owner was very helpful with very quick replies to our questions.

Andrew was a very responsive and enthusiastic host!  He made us feel very welcome at the unit, which we appreciated.  He also replied very quickly to emails and checked in with us when we arrived and left.

The apartment itself is very well-stocked with kitchen appliances, cookware, dining essentials, and beach gear (e.g., boogie boards and beach towels).  We appreciated the convenience of the dishwasher and washer and dryer.  The grounds themselves are perfectly manicured and have many bbq grills which we used on several occasions.  The grounds are very clean and the bbq grills themselves are cleaned by the apartment complex's maintenance crew.  The grounds are right on the edge of a shore (not exactly a beach that one would go to for swimming and lounging) that provide stunning views of the water and sunset.

This apartment is a great value in that you are centrally located among different sights such as Wailea Beach and Lahaina (a 15-30 minute drive).  We would recommend renting a car so that you can drive around the island.  Very few sights would be easily accessible to you otherwise.  There are also a full bathroom for each bedroom, so you have a 2-bedroom, 2-bath apartment.  The master bedroom has a lanai the provides a good view of the island.  The second bedroom's window looks out into the dark hallway of the apartment floor though.  A free parking spot was provided for the unit, which was convenient for our rental car.  There is also a balcony off of the kitchen that provides you with a great view of the water.

Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this unit!

The listing is in a great location with an incredible pool and great place to watch the sunset. It is close to a grocery story, restaurants, etc. The listing was about as described. Bathrooms were both small but worked, and lots of towels and beach gear were provided.

Andrew is a fantastic host - he is a very active and quick communicator. His apartment in Kihei, Maui is beautiful: the location is ideal, the building complex even has a swimming pool and is right at the beach. The apartment itself is spacious, well maintained and gives of a holiday/aloha vibe. Andrew is a generous and flexible host and tried to accommodate wherever possible. We truly enjoyed our experience and stay on the island and I can only recommend his place if you are looking for a fantastic vacation!

Andrew is a perfect host ! I recommended this host to all ...
If all host was like im! That will be perfect
Great place for the money!! Nice beach and clean condo.  Andrew is VERY responsive and great to deal with!

Andrews condo home  is excellent but the check in at the front desk will be unexpected if early going in. It is not what I expected cuz I was told to check at the front desk and I will receive the keys  ASAP but she made us wait until 14:00hours... it was a bummer..

The condo is in a great location central to everything.   The place is well maintained.  My only complaint would be that you will not want to spend much time at this beach.   The ocean is very rocky and not good for any activities.  Also, no walk on the beach as have to go to Walea to do anytime of beach path walking.  The rooms were ok and everything was there that you needed.
Tons of cool beach gear available, very nice place. Road noise a little much, but quiet other than that. Beautiful sunsets & beach a 3 minute walk away.

Andrews place was PERFECT for our group in town for a family wedding.  VERY well stocked with all of the perfect amenities and even some extra touches for the beach, etc.  The condo is convenient to EVERYTHING around Kihei.  The sunsets were AMAZING!  We LOVED the pool.  Andrew was easy to work with, easy to reach and had all of the info we needed to enjoy our stay.  GREAT AirBnB experience
Great location, a lot of equipments for beach entertainment, very clean. We will definitely stay here again.

Andrew's condo in Kihei is steps from the ocean.  Tennis courts/gym/hot tub and pool will keep you entertained all day.   The condo is. Also stocked with everything needed for a smooth vacation.  After hours check is was a breeze and Andrew's timely responses made the vacation that much better.   Will definitely be back!
Andrew’s place was great!!! Has everything you could need. He was incredibly quick to answer any questions I had. We loved it. Thanks!
The host canceled this reservation 327 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The house has just about everything one would have at their own home! Very well stocked! Thanks.
Very nice place, excellent location!

name: Room Close to LGA and 35 mins to Times Square
summary: A private small bedroom in a 2 BR 1BA apartment. There’s no living area as I converted to live in. The location is 2 minutes to Q33 bus stop, 5 minutes to 7 train station ( which directly takes you to Times Square in 35-40 minutes ).
interaction: This apartment has my husband and me. This place also has a chinchilla and a French Bulldog. We are living in this apartment in a living area. And we are offering an actual room for your privacy. I would be very happy to welcome all dog lovers because our frenchie loves to interact with people. So feel free to contact me if you have any questions :)
houseRules: * check-in time AFTER 5:00 pm. Guest is required to communicate and update by messaging AT LEAST 30 MINUTES prior your arrival. NO EARLY CHECK-IN to keep the other guest's privacy.  * STRICT CHECK-OUT TIME IS 11:00 AM. There will be an extra night charge for late check-out with no prior approval * Guest's visitors are not allowed to come in without prior approval * Please take off your shoes at the entrance of the apartment. Per AirBnB’s policy, no 3rd-party bookings

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: The experience is the first for me and I was say it's a good one. The couple is very friendly and it's. Very clean place, and you go in and out as you please. Only drawback, no parking like anywhere else.

Cheer was a perfect host! I arrived later than we had originally planned, but she was completely understanding and was there to welcome me in. The room has everything to make you feel at home : a closet equipped with hangers, umbrella, and iron; television, books, tissues, towels; even a mini-fridge with water and some snacks. The apartment itself is impeccably clean. Lots of restaurants nearby. Safe area. Bonus: cute puppy and chinchillas.
